ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: CombineNestedIfStatements
rule.message: Nested if statements should be combined into a single conditional with && operator for better readability
rule.description: Nested if statements that can be combined should use a single conditional with & & operator instead. This rule detects if statements that contain only another if statement in their body. Combining nested conditionals improves readability and reduces unnecessary indentation levels.
